conbody.p: After the host is started, the system will directly log in the uExceed software. The system with standard configurations will display the Patient Administration interface, and automatically load and display the latest patient information and related data. The PA interface is shown in the following figure.
Main interfaces of the operation and processing system are divided into the following six areas based on the main functions and types of common operations:

li.p: The PA/PR Interface Switching area. Please refer to "PA/PR Interface Switching area" on page 3-3 for details.
The Patient Unit area. Please refer to "Patient Unit area" on page 3-4 for details.
The System Control area. Please refer to "System Control area" on page 3-4 for details.
The System Work area. Please refer to "System Work area" on page 3-5 for details.
The System Tool area. Please refer to "System tool" on page 3-5 for details.
The System Status area. Please refer to "System status bar" on page 3-17 for details.
